div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 570 Lipnica, c. 32 km. S of Vraca, Bul- garia, 1963 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: c. 100 AR. Pot hoard Thasos: spread-flan tetradr. (with Μ and ΜΗ) Apollonia, Illyria: dr. Dyrrhachium: dr. Disposition: Vraca 19 Thasos:, 4 Apollonia, 27 Dyrrhachium Gerasimov, BIAB 27 (1964), p. 242
